user.__COMMENT__: used in registration as default filler

scenes.title: Apple Barrel
scenes.description:
Get as many apples in the barrel as you can.

CONTROLS 
Grip - Pick up the apple and release to throw
B - Return to menu

NOTES
On Easy there is no need to grip as the apple will stick to the hand to be placed in the barrel.

scenes.title: World Builder - Farm
scenes.description:
Build your own little world by placing objects on the table.

CONTROLS
Grip - Pick up the item and release to place
B - Return to menu

NOTES
Must be able to grip.

scenes.title: World Builder - Sci-fi
scenes.description:
Build your own little world by placing objects on the table.

CONTROLS
Grip - Pick up the item and release to place
B - Return to menu

NOTES
Must be able to grip.

scenes.title: World Builder - Vikings
scenes.description:
Build your own little world by placing objects on the table.

CONTROLS
Grip - Pick up the item and release to place
B - Return to menu

NOTES
Must be able to grip.

scenes.title: World Builder - Pirate
scenes.description:
Build your own little world by placing objects on the table.

CONTROLS
Grip - Pick up the item and release to place
B - Return to menu

NOTES
Must be able to grip.

scenes.title: Keep Up
scenes.description:
Keep a pumpkin in the air for as long as you can.

CONTROLS
A - Creates a new pumpkin
B - Return to menu

NOTES
The harder the setting the more you need to reach.

scenes.title: Fruit Smash
scenes.description:
Hit the fruit as far as you can.

CONTROLS
A - Begins the game
B - Return to menu

NOTES
The weather vane points to the direction the fruit will come from next.

scenes.title: Plane Game
scenes.description:
Fly the plane through the rings while dodging the clouds.

CONTROLS
B - Return to menu

NOTES
The pace accelerates over time.

scenes.title: Balance Board
scenes.description:
Tilt your head to control the balance board and try to keep the apples from falling off.

CONTROLS
A - Drop an apple on the board
B - Returns to menu

NOTES
You can use the neck, trunk or knees to tilt the headset depending on what needs to be exercised for sitting or standing balance.

scenes.title: Fruit Catch
scenes.description:
See how many fruit you can stop from passing you by.

CONTROLS
A - Begins the game
B - Return to menu

NOTES
Great for sitting and standing balance.

scenes.title: Cannon Ball Dodge
scenes.description:
Move your head to dodge the cannon balls on a pirate ship.

CONTROLS
B - Return to menu

scenes.title: Boxing Bag
scenes.description:
Do a workout by hitting the boxing bag.

CONTROLS
B - Return to menu

NOTES
Alternate hands for best results.

scenes.title: Ping Pong
scenes.description:
Get a rally going in this quick game of ping pong.

CONTROLS
B - Return to menu

scenes.title: Baseball
scenes.description:
Hit the targets to score some points.

CONTROLS
A - Creates a new ball
B - Return to menu

NOTES
Make sure you’ve got plenty of room for this swinging fun.

scenes.title: Bench Press
scenes.description:
Return to the gym and lift the weight.

CONTROLS
B - Return to menu

NOTES
There’s no timer or counter, it’s designed to be strength training in a familiar environment.

scenes.title: Farm Truck for Fingers
scenes.description:
Try not to crash the remote control car as you drive around the farm.

CONTROLS
Trigger - Accelerate
Grip - Reverse
Thumbstick - Direction
A - Create new car
B - Return to menu

NOTES
Designed to practice advanced motor control.

scenes.title: Basketball
scenes.description:
Score as many hoops as you can.

CONTROLS
A - Spawn new ball
Grip - Grab/release ball
B - Return to menu

scenes.title: Eye Flexion
scenes.description:
Hold your head in the middle of the box to keep the movie playing while it moves in a clockwise rotation. 

CONTROLS
B - Return to menu

NOTES
Follow the film with your eyes to strengthen the eye muscles.

scenes.title: Rowing - Brisbane River
scenes.description:
Row down rivers and across lakes by extending your arms back and forth in front of you in a repetitive motion.

CONTROLS
Controller - Push out and in to row
B - Return to Menu

NOTES
You must first accelerate so keep pumping faster to get going and then settle into your own rhythm.

scenes.title: Rowing - Darling River
scenes.description:
Row down rivers and across lakes by extending your arms back and forth in front of you in a repetitive motion.

CONTROLS
Controller - Push out and in to row
B - Return to Menu

NOTES
You must first accelerate so keep pumping faster to get going and then settle into your own rhythm.

scenes.description:

NOTES

scenes.description:

CONTROLS

B - Return to Menu

NOTES
You must first accelerate so keep pumping faster to get going and then settle into your own rhythm.

scenes.title: Riding - River Boardwalk
scenes.description:
Ride down tracks and paths by waving your hands left and right in front of you in a repetitive motion, as if you were holding the handle bars of a bike.

CONTROLS
Controller - Move left and right
B - Return to Menu

NOTES
You must first accelerate so move fast to get going and then settle into your own rhythm.

scenes.title: Riding - Noosa River
scenes.description:
Ride down tracks and paths by waving your hands left and right in front of you in a repetitive motion, as if you were holding the handle bars of a bike.

CONTROLS

B - Return to Menu

NOTES

CONTROLS

CONTROLS

B - Return to Menu

NOTES

scenes.title: Mindfulness - Loving Kindness
scenes.description:
Sit quietly in a peaceful place and be guided by Jude King in a mindfulness session.

CONTROLS
B - Return to Menu

NOTES
You can control the audio volume with the button on the underside of the headset.

scenes.title: Paint - Blank Canvas
scenes.description:
Paint a masterpiece in 3D space while sitting or standing.

CONTROLS
Trigger - Select colour and paint
B - Return to Menu

NOTES
Set your gaurdian as big as possible so you can paint far and wide.

scenes.description:

scenes.title: Memory
scenes.description:
Train your memory with this simple game.

CONTROLS
Trigger - Point and select
B - Return to Menu

scenes.title: Imagery - Fireplace
scenes.description:
The mirror box on steroids. Try to move your hands along with this first person video. 

CONTROLS
B - Return to Menu

NOTES
Set your controllers aside and try to imagine the hands are yours for the full effect.

scenes.title: Sensation - One Leg Balance - Masculine
scenes.description:
Desensitise pain regional pain by experiencing simulated touch. 

CONTROLS
B - Return to Menu

NOTES
This is designed for people with Complex Regional Pain. Set your controllers aside for the full effect.

scenes.title: Eva - Activating The Face
scenes.description:
Understand the basics of the Feldenkrais Method With Eva Culek. 

CONTROLS
B - Return to Menu

NOTES
Watch the video and practice the methods out of the headset.
